mutants.code:
def calculate_expected_points(n, mod=1000000008):
    modinv = lambda x: pow(x, mod - 2, mod)
    ans = 1
    a = pow(26, n, mod)
    d = a
    a = (a - 1) % mod
    a = a * 2 % mod
    mmi1 = modinv(d)
    mmi2 = modinv(25)
    a = a * mmi1 % mod
    a = a * mmi2 % mod
    ans = (a + ans) % mod
    if n % 2 == 0:
        last = modinv(pow(26, n // 2, mod))
        ans = (ans - last) % mod
    return ans

    if n % 2 == 0:
        last = modinv(pow(26, n // -2, mod))
        ans = (ans - last) % mod
    return ans
